newsitem.title: USA: Donnelley Enterprise gets $22.7 mln pact.
newsitem.headline: Donnelley Enterprise gets $22.7 mln pact.

text.p: Donnelley Enterprise Solutions Inc said Tuesday it signed a three-year renewal contract with the Chicago-based law firm of Sidley & Austin worth a total of $22.7 million in revenue.
Under the contract with Sidley & Austin, Donnelley Enterprise's largest client, the company will provide business services outsourcing.

Donnelley Enterprise said the contract includes core reprographic, or document copying, services and the expansion of services including word processing, desktop publishing, litigation support, and facsimile management.
